evidence.source_document: Complaint for Declaratory and Injunctive Relief
evidence.text: Award Plaintiffs their reasonable attorneys’ fees, costs and expenses pursuant to 42 U.S.C. § 1088 or other applicable statutes;

extracted.value: Plaintiff: Award Plaintiffs their reasonable attorneys’ fees, costs and expenses pursuant to 42 U.S.C. § 1088 or other applicable statutes;

evidence.source_document: Complaint for Declaratory and Injunctive Relief
evidence.text: Issue a declaratory judgment that the exclusion of surgeries for “sex gender change” in 10 U.S.C. Section 1079(a)(11), including the categorical exclusion of surgical treatments for gender dysphoria, is unconstitutional and violates Section 504 of the Rehabilitation Act;

extracted.value: Plaintiff: Issue a declaratory judgment that the exclusion of surgeries for “sex gender change” in 10 U.S.C. Section 1079(a)(11), including the categorical exclusion of surgical treatments for gender dysphoria, is unconstitutional and violates Section 504 of the Rehabilitation Act;

evidence.source_document: Complaint for Declaratory and Injunctive Relief
evidence.text: Issue a permanent injunction prohibiting the Defendants, their agents, employees, representatives, contractors or any third party acting on their behalf from any enforcement or application of the exclusion of surgeries for “sex gender change” in 10 U.S.C. § 1079(a)(11), including surgeries for gender dysphoria, through regulations, policies or any other means, and directing Defendants to provide TRICARE coverage for Plaintiff Jane Doe’s medically necessary gender affirming surgical procedures;

extracted.value: Plaintiff: Issue a permanent injunction prohibiting the Defendants, their agents, employees, representatives, contractors or any third party acting on their behalf from any enforcement or application of the exclusion of surgeries for “sex gender change” in 10 U.S.C. § 1079(a)(11), including surgeries for gender dysphoria, through regulations, policies or any other means, and directing Defendants to provide TRICARE coverage for Plaintiff Jane Doe’s medically necessary gender affirming surgical procedures;

evidence.source_document: Complaint for Declaratory and Injunctive Relief
evidence.text: Award Plaintiffs damages in an amount to be established at trial;

extracted.value: Plaintiff: Award Plaintiffs damages in an amount to be established at trial;

evidence.source_document: Complaint for Declaratory and Injunctive Relief
evidence.text: Award any such other and further relief as this Court deems just and proper.
